channel.title: archlinux on Paul Burton's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in archlinux on Paul Burton's Blog

item.title: ArchLinux MIPS
item.description: I’ve been working recently on compiling ArchLinux for MIPS, more specifically mips32r2. It’s going pretty well & I’m at the point of having enough packages to boot to a KDE desktop both in QEMU and on real hardware. My current focus is on automating the building of new and updated packages, which is progressing steadily. But in the meantime I thought I’d show this and make it available to see who might be interested.
